key.name: viewports
key.description: Number of viewport to be named.

key.name: display-time
key.description: Timeout of the workspacename display (in seconds). (0.1 - 5.0)

key.name: fade-time
key.description: Time the workspacename display uses for the fade-out (in seconds). (0.0 - 5.0)

key.name: bold-text
key.description: Render the workspacename using a bold font.

key.name: text-font-size
key.description: Font size for the text display (in pixels). (6 - 96)

key.name: text-placement
key.description: Selects where to place the text. (0 = Centered on screen, 1 = Top of screen minus offset, 2 = Bottom of screen plus offset)

key.name: vertical-offset
key.description: Vertical offset from top or bottom of the screen (in pixels). (0 - 500)

key.name: back-color
key.description: Background color and opacity of the workspacename display.

key.name: font-color
key.description: Font color and opacity of the workspacename display.
